ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | feqmptd.1 | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 2 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( F : A --> B -> F Fn A ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) |
| 4 |  | #P_dffn5 | |- ( F Fn A <-> F = ( x e. A |-> ( F ` x ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A |-> ( F ` x ) ) ) |
